question:
####[UFAQ 23](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Whispers_in_Nalubaale_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
Does Laamb have to match the strength of an encountered piece of ice to give it barrier?
answer:
No. Just like bypassing a piece of ice with [Femme Fatale](/en/card/20029), Laamb has a "when encountered" ability that is usable regardless of strength.

Can the Runner install [Paperclip](/en/card/11024) from their heap after giving  apiece of ice barrier with Laamb?
